channel.title: Meaning of Desktop Widget?
channel.description: The Qubes 'Getting Started' doc tells me that the padlock icon is a Whonix widget. What does it signify? Unlike the photo displayed in this doc, mine has is greyed out (rather than blue) with an X on it. Unlike every other desktop widget, nothing happens when I click on it. Couldn't find any description in Whonix or Qubes docs. Thanks!

item.title: Meaning of Desktop Widget?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:

Sdwdate-gui

sdwdate - Secure Distributed Web Date - systray - graphical user interface (GUI) - Homepage

item.title: Meaning of Desktop Widget?
item.dc:creator: behemothwerecat
item.description:
The Qubes ‘Getting Started’ doc tells me that the padlock icon is a Whonix widget. What does it signify? Unlike the photo displayed in this doc, mine has is greyed out (rather than blue) with an X on it. Unlike every other desktop widget, nothing happens when I click on it. Couldn’t find any description in Whonix or Qubes docs. Thanks!

Read full topic
